title: Learning Visual Question Answering by Bootstrapping Hard Attention

tldr.text: This work introduces a new approach for hard attention and finds it achieves very competitive performance on a recently-released visual question answering datasets, equalling and in some cases surpassing similar soft attention architectures while entirely ignoring some features.
